name: eubid
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wb(weu(s0, w1), weu(s0, w2)), wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(weu(s0, w1), weu(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)), wb(weu(s0, w1), weu(s0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(weu(s0, w1), weu(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)), wb(weu(s0, w1), weu(s0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(weu(s0, w1), weu(s0, w2)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)), wb(weu(s0, w1), weu(s0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

body.origin: |- wi(wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)), wb(weu(s0, w1), weu(s0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(weu(s0, w1), weu(s0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

comment: Formula-building rule for the unique existential quantifier (deduction form). (Contributed by NM, 9-Jul-1994.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 19-Feb-2023.)
